description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. It starts with a tree, and it could end with an empire! Grow the most bananas and find a girl to share your riches.
description.short: It starts with a tree, and it could end with an empire! Grow the most bananas and find a girl to share your riches.
